name: Recoil (itch) (Dranzer799)
description:
How to Play:

Use "Mouse" to Rotate the Ship.

Use "Left Mouse Button" to fire a bullet

You can only move by using the recoil from your bullets, so you wil have to sacrifice your ammo for movement.

Enemy ships will try to ram into your ship. You can take atmost 4 hits. They will get destroyed after one hit from your bullet. When destroyed, theres a chance enemy ships will drop an ammo pack

You can pick ammo packs to get more bullets. Each ammo pack gives three bullets.

Survive for as long as you can, and have fun!!!

Credits:

Ship Assets: Spaceship Asset Pack by Gisha

Background Art: Dynamic Space Background Lite by DinV Studio

Music: Bush Week - Nihilore

Icons: Pause Play
